summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2268 for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest, from West Fifty-sixth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 23435, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
